title: Best of The Herd for Jun 02, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jun 02, 2020
description:
Dak Prescott is the exact player that the franchise tag was designed for

The Cowboys get overrated because of how popular they are

Health is not why Cam newton isn't on an NFL team

Three NFL teams Colin likes more than most and three he likes a lot less in 2020


Guests:

Nick Wright, FS1's First Things First

Stephen Jackson, former NBA player and long time friend of George Floyd
